meanings.sent1: The imperishableness of the diamond made it a valuable heirloom.
meanings.sent2: The imperishableness of the ancient artifact amazed the archaeologists.
meanings.sent3: The imperishableness of the cake was so impressive that it stayed fresh for weeks!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like the imperishableness of a timeless painting.
meanings.sent5: The imperishableness of the memory was etched in her mind forever.

meanings.definition: The state of being unable to perish or decay.
meanings.sent1: The imperishableness of the rock formation was a testament to its age.
meanings.sent2: The imperishableness of the steel ensured the bridge's longevity.
meanings.sent3: The imperishableness of the fruitcake was a mystery to the guests at the party.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like the imperishableness of a mountain against the elements.
meanings.sent5: The imperishableness of the ancient ruins fascinated the historians.
